page.title: 18HOME LIFE - Saturday
page.content: Woken by the telephone at 8am l lay in bed listening to Radio One and savouring the smell of Dad's favourite breakfast- bacon, egg, mushrooms and sausage. l went downstairs to eat my cornflakes + then returned to tidy my room and have a bath. Mummy, Daddy and sister motored to Lymington to shop. My other sister practised the bassoon. At 12.30 l went to my weekend job at a local hotel. When l returned at 6pm Mummy had finished the housework and was gardening while Daddy was cutting the grass. Our supper was stew with dumplings followed by ice-cream and hot chocolate sauce. We helped to wash up then watched the TV until 10pm when we went to bed.
